name: Nerdy Farm Girl Makeover & Spa
description:
So busy in your studies that you forgot to grow up. It’s hard to be a nerdy girl and then become a fashion diva. It’s hard to understand that you can’t socialize and be book worm at the same time!

Your salon is open now and you can help all the nerdy girls become stylish divas! Her confidence will go up but at the same time she can become a prom queen.


Her new diet and immense work out can become the start of her transformation, this girl will need a full body makeover. Pick from different spa tools to clean her up and make her skin shiny and clear, then focus on her makeup and style her hair just right. When she looks like a doll, select from a fabulous outfit for her to make her star as a stylish diva! Your awesome spa can make this nerdy girl go from a bookworm hiding in the library to a cute girl who has conquered the fashion diva show!


Game Features :

- Game for girls of all ages.
- Nerdy girls would love the theme.
- Your spa to clean up and clear up her skin.
- Awesome makeups to choose from to match outfits.
- Cute hairstyles from curls to haircuts.
- Tons of stylish outfits to choose from.
- Enjoy a workout at the gym and a new diet to stay fit!
